Name: I LIKE THE FLOWERS
About the game: This is an atmospheric and soulful game about memories and life. The game is about solving small puzzles, where Anna, a little forgetful flower girl, will often need the player's help. Taking the path of her memories, you will be more and more immersed in her story, helping her on her way back home. With each next step, the tasks will become more difficult, and the trials will begin to challenge the player. But the details of the story can slip away without them, so you will have to be very attentive.
